title: how would you go about starting a petetion to be placed on a ballot to prevent all panhandling and election and business signs on highway and street right of ways?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2009/07/how-many-signatures-does-it-take-to-get-a-measure-on-the-ballot-for-statewide-elections/
